metadata.title: Wednesday, 10th December, 2014
metadata.session: FOURTH SESSION OF THE ELEVENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Community Development, Mother and Child Health when the Government will construct health posts at the following places in Nchelenge Parliamentary Constituency
parts: (a)    Mukwakwa;
(b)    Ntoto;
(c)    Kanaya;
(d)    Lunde; and
(e)    Lupili.

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Housing
parts: (a)    whether the Government has any plans to drill boreholes in the Luano Valley in Mkushi South Parliamentary Constituency;
(b)    if so, when the drilling works will commence; and
(c)    how many boreholes are earmarked for drilling in the area.

questions.minister: Minister of Mines, Energy and Water Development
parts: (a)    how many electricity generation stations were constructed from January, 2011 to December, 2013, country-wide, by name; and
(b)    how many stations were upgraded during the same period, by name.

questions.minister: Minister of Education, Science, Vocational Training and Early Education
parts: (a)    when the Government will officially open the following Schools in Kapiri Mposhi Parliamentary Constituency:
(i)    Kapiri Day Secondary; (ii)    Chipepo Secondary; and (iii)    Kapiri Girls Technical; and
(b)    whether the Government has any plans to relocate the poorly located sewerage ponds at Kapiri Girls Technical School.

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Housing when the construction of the following infrastructure in Sikongo District will commence
parts: (a)    council offices;
(b)    market;
(c)    council guest house; and
(d)    staff houses.
(a)    when the Disaster Management and Mitigation Unit will disburse funds for purposes of working on the gully in Namukolo Ward in Lubansenshi Parliamentary Constituency; and
(b)    what the estimated cost of the exercise is.

questions.minister: Minister of Mines, Energy and Water Development
parts: (a)    who the owners of the copper mine situated in Mkushi South Parliamentary Constituency are;
(b)    whether the mine is operational;
(c)    if so, when operations commenced;
(d)    what the total capital investment in the mine is; and
(e)    what the production levels of the mine are.

questions.minister: Minister of Community Development, Mother and Child Health
parts: (a)    when the deployment of medical staff to Musamani Clinic in Muchinga Parliamentary Constituency will commence;
(b)    what has caused the delay in deploying staff to the Clinic; and
(c)    how long it takes for the Government to deploy medical staff upon completion of construction of a health facility.

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Housing
parts: (a)    what measures the Government is taking to improve the operations and training programmes at the National Fire Service Training School in Kabwe;
(b)    whether the Government has any plans to procure a new fire tender for the Kabwe Municipal Council; and
(c)    if so, when the fire tender will be procured.

questions.minister: Minister of Education, Science, Vocational Training and Early Education
parts: (a)    whether the Government has any plans to build a boarding school in Nkeyema District; and
